tree.name: Jakob Poeltl
tree.tradeDescription: Raptors acquired Poeltl from Spurs for Khem Birch, a 2024 first-round pick (top-6 protected), and second-round picks in 2023 and 2025
tree.note: Returned to Toronto where he was originally drafted in 2016

assetsGivenUp.name: Khem Birch
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as free agent during 2020-21 season

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 First Round Pick (top-6 protected in 2024-2026)
assetsGivenUp.note: TOR's pick conveyed at #8 to SAS (outside top-6 protection). SAS traded Dillingham to MIN on draft night.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 Second Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: TOR's 2023 second-round pick sent to SAS in Poeltl trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 Second Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: TOR's 2025 second-round pick sent to SAS in Poeltl trade. Subsequently traded to DAL then CHO.
